Text.Page:
Velika's really big. Learning to navigate and find what you need in the federation capital will make other cities seem easy to get around in.

Eikvan can give you a few tipsâ€”he's standing right behind me.

New here? Lots to do in Velika. You can buy, sell, bank, get training, even learn to craft weapons and armor.

The Mysterium gave us some teleportals to help get around a little faster, but walking's free.

Enjoy your stay!"How do I teleport?"

There's a teleportal up those steps just east of here. When you get close, press the F key and choose a location.

Check your Mini-Map if you're not sure where you're going.

You'll have to teleport from one of those locations to get directly back here. Like I said, walking's free and maybe a little simpler, but who says no to the Mysterium?
